snippet: Nadine Broersen of the Netherlands won the pentathlon at the world indoor championships in Sopot, Poland, hanging on in the closing 800 meters to beat Brianne Theisen-Eaton of Canada.
abstract: Nadine Broersen of Netherlands wins pentathlon at world indoor championships in Sopot, Poland.
lead_paragraph: Nadine Broersen of the Netherlands won the pentathlon at the world indoor championships in Sopot, Poland, hanging on in the closing 800 meters to beat Brianne Theisen-Eaton of Canada.
